channel.title: Getting Started on
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on

item.title: Java
item.description: Immutable type # ConstructorPropertiesIntrospector # 0. Prerequisites # Should satisfy one of below preconditions record type any constructors with @ConstructorProperties Multiple constructors with record would be instantiated by constructor with @ConstructorProperties 1. Altering objectIntrospector option # FixtureMonkey fixtureMonkey = FixtureMonkey.builder() .objectIntrospector(ConstructorPropertiesArbitraryIntrospector.INSTANCE) .build(); FactoryMethodArbitraryIntrospector # 0. Prerequisites # static factory method 1. Altering objectIntrospector option # FixtureMonkey fixtureMonkey = FixtureMonkey.builder() .objectIntrospector(FactoryMethodArbitraryIntrospector.INSTANCE) .build(); JacksonArbitraryIntrospector # This practice should add extra module because it depends on third-party library Jackson 0.

item.title: Java with lombok
item.description: @Value # ConstructorPropertiesIntrospector # 0. Prerequisites # Should satisfy one of below preconditions add lombok.anyConstructor.addConstructorProperties=true in lombok.config any constructors with @ConstructorProperties Multiple constructors with record would be instantiated by constructor with @ConstructorProperties 1. Altering objectIntrospector option # FixtureMonkey fixtureMonkey = FixtureMonkey.builder() .objectIntrospector(ConstructorPropertiesArbitraryIntrospector.INSTANCE) .build(); JacksonArbitraryIntrospector # This practice should add extra module because it depends on third-party library Jackson 1. Adding dependency # testImplementation("com.navercorp.fixturemonkey:fixture-monkey-jackson:0.5.0") <dependency> <groupId>com.navercorp.fixturemonkey</groupId> <artifactId>fixture-monkey-jackson</artifactId> <version>0.5.0</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> 2. Altering objectIntrospector option # If you have custom ObjectMapper # FixtureMonkey fixtureMonkey = FixtureMonkey.

item.title: Kotlin
item.description: PrimaryConstructorArbitraryIntrospector # 1. Altering objectIntrospector option # FixtureMonkey fixtureMonkey = FixtureMonkey.builder() .plugin(KotlinPlugin()) .build(); JacksonArbitraryIntrospector # This practice should add extra module because it depends on third-party library Jackson 1. Adding dependency # testImplementation("com.navercorp.fixturemonkey:fixture-monkey-jackson:0.5.0") <dependency> <groupId>com.navercorp.fixturemonkey</groupId> <artifactId>fixture-monkey-jackson</artifactId> <version>0.5.0</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> 2. Altering objectIntrospector option # If you have custom ObjectMapper # FixtureMonkey fixtureMonkey = FixtureMonkey.builder() .plugin(KotlinPlugin()) .plugin(JacksonPlugin(objectMapper)) .build(); If you DON’T have a custom ObjectMapper # FixtureMonkey fixtureMonkey = FixtureMonkey.builder() .plugin(KotlinPlugin()) .
